params._secret: The secret that unlocks the funds*

getBridgeTransferDetail(bytes32).details: Returns the details of a specific bridge transfer

params._bridgeTransferId: Unique identifier for the bridge transfer

returns.amount: The amount of assets to be allocated and sent
returns.exists: Boolean indicating if the bridge transfer exists
returns.hashLock: The hash of the secret that will unlock the funds
returns.originator: The address allowed to withdraw (claim) the funds
returns.recipient: The address intended to receive the assets
returns.timeLock: The timestamp until which this BridgeTransfer is valid*

initiateBridgeTransfer(uint256,address,a.details: Creates a new atomic bridge transfer using native ETH

params._hashLock: The hash of the secret (HASH) that will unlock the funds
params._originator: The address allowed to withdraw (claim) the funds once the correct secret is provided on timeout. Used to transfer the funds.
params._recipient: The address on the other chain to which to transfer the funds
params._timeLock: The number of blocks until which this BridgeTransfer is valid and can be executed
params._wethAmount: The amount of WETH to send

returns._bridgeTransferId: A unique id representing this BridgeTransfer*

refundBridgeTransfer(bytes32).details: Refunds the funds back to the initiator if the timelock has expired
